name: Home
tagline: We're passionate about creating 100% glutten free products.
body:
### Welcome to the Wheatless Wonder.
This website has been taken down temporarily until National Submission dates have passed. No copy cats, or spammers are allowed now.

If you are one of those that left horrible reviews in our online comment form, you should be ashamed and jealous now.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
